entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 07:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -38.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
